body:
Working for me with IPython 2.1.0

```
damian@damian-S400CA:/media/datos/Desarrollos$ ipython nbconvert 0.\ Por\ qué\ Python.ipynb --to slides --post serve
[NbConvertApp] Using existing profile dir: u'/home/damian/.ipython/profile_default'
[NbConvertApp] Converting notebook 0. Por qué Python.ipynb to slides
[NbConvertApp] Support files will be in 0. Por qué Python_files/
[NbConvertApp] Loaded template slides_reveal.tpl
[NbConvertApp] Writing 187865 bytes to 0. Por qué Python.slides.html
[NbConvertApp] Redirecting reveal.js requests to https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/reveal.js/2.5.0
Serving your slides at http://127.0.0.1:8000/0. Por qué Python.slides.html
Use Control-C to stop this server
Se ha abierto una nueva ventana en la sesión actual del navegador.
```
